events.name: Russian Attack on Ukraine
events.wd_description: Russian forces have begun an attack on Ukraine, with reports of troops crossing the border, explosions in multiple cities, and warnings from Russian President Vladimir Putin.
events.description: Russian forces have begun an attack on Ukraine, with reports of troops crossing the border, explosions in multiple cities, and warnings from Russian President Vladimir Putin.

events.name: Initial Attack
events.wd_description: The offensive that Russia called a “special military operation” began with blasts heard around 5 a.m. Thursday, targeting various Ukrainian cities including the capital Kyiv.
events.description: The offensive that Russia called a “special military operation” began with blasts heard around 5 a.m. Thursday, targeting various Ukrainian cities including the capital Kyiv.

events.name: Invasion Strategy
events.wd_description: Russian troops crossed the border to the north and south of Ukraine, with explosions reported in multiple cities.
events.description: Russian troops crossed the border to the north and south of Ukraine, with explosions reported in multiple cities.

events.name: Statements from Putin
events.wd_description: Putin announced a military operation in the Donbas region and threatened any country that attempts to intervene on Ukraine's behalf.
events.description: Putin announced a military operation in the Donbas region and threatened any country that attempts to intervene on Ukraine's behalf.

events.name: Ukrainian Response
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky enacted martial law, and Ukrainian forces have taken on the first blow of the enemy and are resisting.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky enacted martial law, and Ukrainian forces have taken on the first blow of the enemy and are resisting.

events.name: Zelensky's Statements
events.wd_description: Zelensky appealed for peace but vowed that Ukraine would defend itself against the Russian attack.
events.description: Zelensky appealed for peace but vowed that Ukraine would defend itself against the Russian attack.

events.name: Martial Law Declaration
events.wd_description: Zelensky moved to enact martial law as air raid sirens rang out across Kyiv.
events.description: Zelensky moved to enact martial law as air raid sirens rang out across Kyiv.

events.name: International Reactions
events.wd_description: Immediate condemnation from the United States and its allies, with threats of “full scale” sanctions against Russia.
events.description: Immediate condemnation from the United States and its allies, with threats of “full scale” sanctions against Russia.

events.name: US Response
events.wd_description: US President Joe Biden issued a statement condemning Russia's attack and promising a united and decisive response.
events.description: US President Joe Biden issued a statement condemning Russia's attack and promising a united and decisive response.

events.name: EU Response
events.wd_description: EU leaders promised to weaken Russia’s economic base and capacity to modernize through sanctions.
events.description: EU leaders promised to weaken Russia’s economic base and capacity to modernize through sanctions.

events.name: UN Involvement
events.wd_description: The UN Security Council met to call for a peaceful resolution to the crisis, with US Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield saying Putin had “delivered a message of war.”
events.description: The UN Security Council met to call for a peaceful resolution to the crisis, with US Ambassador Linda Thomas-Greenfield saying Putin had “delivered a message of war.”

events.name: Ground Situation
events.wd_description: Ukraine's borders are under attack from Russian forces, with explosions heard in multiple cities and residents fleeing Kyiv.
events.description: Ukraine's borders are under attack from Russian forces, with explosions heard in multiple cities and residents fleeing Kyiv.

events.name: Border Attacks
events.wd_description: Russian troops attacked border units, patrol borders, and checkpoints with artillery, heavy equipment, and small arms.
events.description: Russian troops attacked border units, patrol borders, and checkpoints with artillery, heavy equipment, and small arms.

events.name: Civilian Impact
events.wd_description: Civilians are seen leaving Kyiv and seeking shelter in subway stations, with concerns over the safety of residents amidst the attacks.
events.description: Civilians are seen leaving Kyiv and seeking shelter in subway stations, with concerns over the safety of residents amidst the attacks.

events.name: Severe flooding in Sumatra, Indonesia, January 2022
events.wd_label: Severe flooding in Sumatra, Indonesia, January 2022
events.wd_description: Torrential rains in Sumatra, Indonesia, caused severe flooding, displacing over 30,000 people and leading to the deaths of two children, with significant damage to crops and concerns about a potential COVID-19 spike.
events.description: Torrential rains in Sumatra, Indonesia, caused severe flooding, displacing over 30,000 people and leading to the deaths of two children, with significant damage to crops and concerns about a potential COVID-19 spike.

events.name: Flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces
events.wd_label: Flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces
events.wd_description: Heavy rain led to flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces, submerging villages and towns, with Hatta's village underwater since the start of the year, and over 30,000 people displaced.
events.description: Heavy rain led to flooding in Aceh and surrounding provinces, submerging villages and towns, with Hatta's village underwater since the start of the year, and over 30,000 people displaced.

events.name: Impact on local economy and health
events.wd_label: Impact on local economy and health
events.wd_description: The flooding destroyed rice crops and disrupted day laborers, devastating the local economy, while fears grow of a rise in respiratory illnesses and a potential COVID-19 spike due to crowded shelters.
events.description: The flooding destroyed rice crops and disrupted day laborers, devastating the local economy, while fears grow of a rise in respiratory illnesses and a potential COVID-19 spike due to crowded shelters.

events.name: Response and mitigation efforts
events.wd_description: Local authorities declared a state of emergency, providing aid such as food and blankets, while planning for long-term solutions like the Keureuto Dam to prevent future flooding.
events.description: Local authorities declared a state of emergency, providing aid such as food and blankets, while planning for long-term solutions like the Keureuto Dam to prevent future flooding.

events.name: Landslide in Petrópolis, Brazil
events.wd_description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.
events.description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.

events.name: Landslide
events.wd_description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.
events.description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.

events.name: Search and Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.
events.description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.

events.name: Government Response
events.wd_description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.
events.description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.

events.name: U.S. Domestic EV Battery Supply Chain Development
events.wd_label: U.S. Domestic EV Battery Supply Chain Development
events.wd_description: North American automotive OEMs are committed to establishing a domestic supply chain for EV batteries to meet the goal of converting at least half of the U.S. market to EVs by 2030, amidst significant investments and challenges.
events.description: North American automotive OEMs are committed to establishing a domestic supply chain for EV batteries to meet the goal of converting at least half of the U.S. market to EVs by 2030, amidst significant investments and challenges.

events.name: EV Battery Plant Projects
events.wd_description: Nearly a dozen EV battery plant projects involving capital expenditures of more than $1 billion have been initiated or announced, totaling $17 billion from Detroit's Big Three automakers.
events.description: Nearly a dozen EV battery plant projects involving capital expenditures of more than $1 billion have been initiated or announced, totaling $17 billion from Detroit's Big Three automakers.

events.name: Project Announcements
events.wd_description: Major EV battery plant projects have been initiated or announced by North American automotive OEMs.
events.description: Major EV battery plant projects have been initiated or announced by North American automotive OEMs.

events.name: Investment Amount
events.wd_description: Detroit's Big Three automakers have invested a total of $17 billion in these EV battery plant projects.
events.description: Detroit's Big Three automakers have invested a total of $17 billion in these EV battery plant projects.

events.name: Dependency on Overseas Components
events.wd_description: In the near term, most components used to make EV batteries at new assembly plants will come from overseas, with over 90% of production still based in Asia.
events.description: In the near term, most components used to make EV batteries at new assembly plants will come from overseas, with over 90% of production still based in Asia.

events.name: Overseas Production
events.wd_description: Most EV battery components, including lithium battery cells, anodes, cathodes, separators, and battery packs, are produced in Asia.
events.description: Most EV battery components, including lithium battery cells, anodes, cathodes, separators, and battery packs, are produced in Asia.

events.name: Supply Chain Challenges
events.wd_description: The dependency on overseas production creates supply chain challenges for the North American EV market.
events.description: The dependency on overseas production creates supply chain challenges for the North American EV market.

events.name: Domestic BMS and TMS Production
events.wd_description: The U.S. has a healthy supply of domestic producers for Battery Management Systems (BMS) and Thermal Management Systems (TMS), essential for EV battery safety and performance.
events.description: The U.S. has a healthy supply of domestic producers for Battery Management Systems (BMS) and Thermal Management Systems (TMS), essential for EV battery safety and performance.

events.name: BMS Producers
events.wd_description: Major BMS producers in the U.S. include Leclanché North America, Infinion, and Nuvation Energy.
events.description: Major BMS producers in the U.S. include Leclanché North America, Infinion, and Nuvation Energy.

events.name: TMS Producers
events.wd_description: Major TMS producers in the U.S. include Dana, VOSS Automotive, and Hanon Systems.
events.description: Major TMS producers in the U.S. include Dana, VOSS Automotive, and Hanon Systems.

events.name: Global Lithium Battery Cell Producers
events.wd_description: The majority of global lithium battery cell production is dominated by companies based in China, South Korea, and Japan, with Tesla emerging as a new contender.
events.description: The majority of global lithium battery cell production is dominated by companies based in China, South Korea, and Japan, with Tesla emerging as a new contender.

events.name: Leading Producers
events.wd_description: The top global lithium battery cell producers include LG Energy Solution (South Korea), CATV (China), BYD (China), SK Innovation (South Korea), Samsung SDI (South Korea), and Panasonic (Japan).
events.description: The top global lithium battery cell producers include LG Energy Solution (South Korea), CATV (China), BYD (China), SK Innovation (South Korea), Samsung SDI (South Korea), and Panasonic (Japan).

events.name: Tesla's Production Plans
events.wd_description: Tesla is expanding its battery cell production with new 4680 series high-energy cells at gigafactories in Austin, Berlin, and Shanghai.
events.description: Tesla is expanding its battery cell production with new 4680 series high-energy cells at gigafactories in Austin, Berlin, and Shanghai.

events.name: Tesla's Battery Production Expansion
events.wd_description: Tesla is set to become one of the world's largest producers of lithium battery cells with new production lines deploying its 4680 series high-energy, lower-cost battery cell design.
events.description: Tesla is set to become one of the world's largest producers of lithium battery cells with new production lines deploying its 4680 series high-energy, lower-cost battery cell design.

events.name: 4680 Series Battery Cells
events.wd_description: Tesla's 4680 battery cells generate six times more power and have five times the energy storage capacity of previous designs.
events.description: Tesla's 4680 battery cells generate six times more power and have five times the energy storage capacity of previous designs.

events.name: New Gigafactories
events.wd_description: Tesla is launching large-scale battery cell production lines at gigafactories in Austin, Berlin, and Shanghai.
events.description: Tesla is launching large-scale battery cell production lines at gigafactories in Austin, Berlin, and Shanghai.

events.name: Production Capacity
events.wd_description: The new gigafactories will have a combined production capacity of 100 GWh, sufficient to supply EV batteries for up to 600,000 vehicles per year.
events.description: The new gigafactories will have a combined production capacity of 100 GWh, sufficient to supply EV batteries for up to 600,000 vehicles per year.

events.name: U.S. Policy and Investments
events.wd_description: The Biden Administration aims to develop a domestic lithium-ion battery supply chain to mitigate climate change impact and comply with new rules of origin under the USMCA.
events.description: The Biden Administration aims to develop a domestic lithium-ion battery supply chain to mitigate climate change impact and comply with new rules of origin under the USMCA.

events.name: Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act
events.wd_description: The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act dedicates significant funds to support the domestic battery supply chain.
events.description: The Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act dedicates significant funds to support the domestic battery supply chain.

events.name: New Rules of Origin
events.wd_description: New USMCA rules require 70-75% of core parts in vehicles, including EV batteries, to be produced locally to qualify for tariff-free trade.
events.description: New USMCA rules require 70-75% of core parts in vehicles, including EV batteries, to be produced locally to qualify for tariff-free trade.

events.name: Recycling Initiatives
events.wd_description: The U.S. automotive industry is establishing a supply chain for recycled EV battery materials, involving several new partnerships and recycling centers.
events.description: The U.S. automotive industry is establishing a supply chain for recycled EV battery materials, involving several new partnerships and recycling centers.

events.name: Redwood Materials and Ford Partnership
events.wd_description: Redwood Materials is building a closed-loop EV battery recycling supply chain for Ford to recycle key materials.
events.description: Redwood Materials is building a closed-loop EV battery recycling supply chain for Ford to recycle key materials.

events.name: Li-Cycle and KSP Investment
events.wd_description: Koch Strategic Platforms is investing $100 million in Li-Cycle to build new EV battery recycling centers in North America.
events.description: Koch Strategic Platforms is investing $100 million in Li-Cycle to build new EV battery recycling centers in North America.

events.name: Other Recycling Projects
events.wd_description: Other companies like Retriev Technologies and American Battery Technology Co. are also building recycling facilities to support the EV battery supply chain.
events.description: Other companies like Retriev Technologies and American Battery Technology Co. are also building recycling facilities to support the EV battery supply chain.
